newsitem.title: USA: Quote.com to provide news and charts for E-Trade site.
newsitem.headline: Quote.com to provide news and charts for E-Trade site.

text.p: Financial market information firm Quote.com Inc., said Thursday it will provide real-time news and charts for E-TRADE Group Inc.'s online Internet securities trading service.

Quote.com, a privately-held company with venture funding from Sequoia Capital Corp., said the strategic partnership agreement allows E-Trade users single-click access to stock quotes, charts and real-time news capabililities.
Quote.com said it has 150,000 registered users with an average net worth of $1.2 millionm and that one-third of its subscribers manage securities valued at $50,000-$250,000.
